message: 1、修复模拟卡片时导致部分系统卡死的问题||2、修复每次操作时Magisk都弹好多次授权提示弹框的问题||3、大大提升模拟速度，只需2 ~ 4秒||4、适配部分极光系统
message_en: 1. Fix the issue that caused some systems to freeze when simulating a card.||2. Fix the problem that Magisk pops up authorization prompts many times during each operation.||3. Greatly improve the simulation speed, it only takes 2 to 4 seconds.||4. Adapt part of the Aurora system.
